definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Some of the key headers used to address nonfunctional requirements are covered later as well.
sentences.chinese: 稍後將介紹一些用於解決非功能性需求的關鍵報頭。

sentences.english: One of the mastheads was designed by a 12-year-old girl.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個報頭是由一個12歲的小女孩設計的。

sentences.english: Typically these headers contain a content-length and content-type.
sentences.chinese: 通常，這些報頭包含內容長度和內容類型。

definition: to whisper to one another's ear
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
toss a peach, get back a plum (idiom); to return a favor/to exchange gifts/Scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end

definition: out of ammunition and no food left (idiom); in desperate straits
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
